text: The Loktantrik Samajwadi Party, Nepal (), is the sixth largest political party in Nepal. ==Establishment== The party was officially registered at Election Commission, Nepal on 18 August 2021. Mahantha Thakur is the president of the new party. The party was formed after split in PSP-N to join KP Oli led government. Currently, the party stands as the fourth largest party of Madhesh Province after Nepali Congress, CPN (UML) and Janata Samajbadi respectively. ==Allies== As of August 2021, the party is a junior ally in the Nepali Congress-led Deuba government along with CPN (Maoist Centre), PSP-N, and CPN (Unified Socialist). The party's election symbol is a bicycle. ==References== Category:Political parties in Nepal Category:2021 establishments in Asia Category:2020s establishments in Nepal
title: Loktantrik Samajwadi Party, Nepal
